statements: SELECT * FROM motion_sensor_activations
SELECT id, activation_time, sensor_id FROM motion_sensor_activations WHERE intruder_detected = true
SELECT location, activation_time FROM motion_sensor_activations ORDER BY activation_time DESC
SELECT id, location FROM motion_sensor_activations WHERE sensor_id = 101 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT AVG(id) AS avg_id, COUNT(*) AS count FROM motion_sensor_activations GROUP BY intruder_detected
SELECT * FROM motion_sensor_activations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM motion_sensor_activations WHERE intruder_detected = true;
SELECT location, activation_time FROM motion_sensor_activations ORDER BY activation_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM motion_sensor_activations WHERE location LIKE '%Kitchen%' AND intruder_detected = false;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS activation_count FROM motion_sensor_activations GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM motion_sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT location, activation_timestamp FROM motion_sensor_data WHERE activation_timestamp >= '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM motion_sensor_data ORDER BY activation_timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) FROM intruder_alerts GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) FROM motion_sensor_data GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2;
SELECT * FROM motion_sensor_data ORDER BY activation_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, sensor_id, activation_timestamp FROM motion_sensor_data WHERE location = 'Living Room';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_entries FROM motion_sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS total_alerts FROM intruder_alerts GROUP BY sensor_id ORDER BY total_alerts DESC;
SELECT * FROM motion_sensor_data WHERE activation_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM motion_sensors;
SELECT id, sensor_id, activated_at, location FROM motion_sensors ORDER BY activated_at DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, activated_at FROM motion_sensors WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) FROM motion_sensors GROUP BY location;
SELECT id, sensor_id, activated_at FROM motion_sensors WHERE activated_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM motion_sensors WHERE location = 'Living Room' AND sensor_id = 123 ORDER BY activated_at DESC;
SELECT location, activated_at FROM motion_sensors INNER JOIN intruders ON motion_sensors.sensor_id = intruders.intruder_id WHERE activated_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY activated_at ASC;
SELECT intruder_id, location FROM intruder_locations WHERE motion_sensor_id IS NOT NULL AND location LIKE '%Kitchen%' ORDER BY id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_intruders, AVG(id) AS avg_id FROM intruders GROUP BY authorized HAVING authorized = TRUE ORDER BY avg_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM motion_sensors UNION SELECT DISTINCT location FROM intruder_locations ORDER BY location;
SELECT * FROM sensors
SELECT sensor_id, location, battery_level FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC
SELECT name, captured_image FROM intruders WHERE intruder_id = 3
SELECT event_id, timestamp FROM motion_sensor_activations WHERE motion_detected = TRUE
SELECT alert_id, sensor_id, message FROM alerts
SELECT * FROM motion_sensor_activations ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, location, battery_level FROM sensors WHERE battery_level > 50;
SELECT intruder_id, name FROM intruders WHERE captured_image IS NOT NULL ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, message FROM alerts WHERE message LIKE '%intruder%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM motion_sensor_activations JOIN sensors ON motion_sensor_activations.sensor_id = sensors.sensor_id WHERE battery_level < 20 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM motion_sensor_data ORDER BY activation_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_name = 'Motion Sensor';
SELECT intruder_id, detected_time, location FROM intruder_data WHERE detected_time >= '2022-01-01' AND detected_time < '2022-02-01';
SELECT sensor_id, log_time, log_data FROM sensor_logs WHERE sensor_id = 'e47d1e10-7b31-4263-8022-7f0407b7bcf1' ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM intruder_images WHERE image_id IN ('9dcf52d3-8863-4c46-81a6-a291f396e0da', 'a82c1b33-1f47-40c2-9c8b-5bf9c0f7a57c');
SELECT * FROM motion_sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = '6ba7b810-9dad-11d1-80b4-00c04fd430c8' ORDER BY activation_time DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM sensors WHERE location = 'Living Room' AND sensor_name LIKE 'Motion%';
SELECT * FROM intruder_data WHERE detected_time BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY detected_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_id, log_time, log_data FROM sensor_logs WHERE sensor_id = '4da18d37-6146-43bc-802c-159f6724a1eb' AND log_time > '2022-07-15' ORDER BY log_time ASC;
SELECT intruder_id, image_data FROM intruder_images WHERE intruder_id = 'a346dece-fc9d-4fc3-af45-ec0594d2790a' ORDER BY image_id DESC;
